snippet: Eskinder Nega has been imprisoned since September and his wife, Serkalem Fasil, accepted a press freedom award from PEN America on his behalf.
abstract: PEN America gives prestigious press freedom award to Eskinder Nega, a prominent Ethiopian journalist, whose defiant stance in defense of human rights has kept him imprisoned since September 2011; his wife, Serkalem Fasil, a journalist who was jailed with her husband in 2005, accepts the award for him in New York.
lead_paragraph: Eskinder Nega has been imprisoned since September and his wife, Serkalem Fasil, accepted a press freedom award from PEN America on his behalf.

headline.seo: Eskinder Nega, Ethiopian Journalist, Honored by PEN
headline.main: Imprisoned Ethiopian Journalist Is Honored With PEN Award
headline.print_headline: Imprisoned Ethiopian Journalist Is Honored With PEN Award
